thread.title: Cyclist escorted off M25 after being told the motorway is not a velodrome
thread.title_full: Cyclist escorted off M25 after being told the motorway is not a velodrome | London - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Cyclist escorted off M25 after being told the motorway is not a velodrome
text:
A cyclist has been escorted off the M25 by the Roads Policing Unit and reminded that the road is not a velodrome.
Cyclist escorted off M25. Credit: BCH Road Policing/ Twitter Officers stopped the man, who was cycling on the hard shoulder of the M25 near Watford, on Sunday afternoon.
BCH Road Policing @roadpoliceBCH Follow The M25 is not Hertfordshire's new velodrome. Stopped near Watford,escorted off and reported. 411810 https://t.co/avMPV36Nyr
14:06 - 5 Feb 2017 Retweet Reply Favourite It is illegal for cyclists to use the motorway, along with pedestrians, horse riders and powered mobility scooters.
Last updated Mon 6 Feb 2017 London
